title: Help!
body: My mouse won't show up when I play in full screen mode. I was told to go to control panel to fix it, but where is that?!? Please help!

replies.body:
There may be an issue with your Windows settings, and needs to get configured to show up in game.  Specifically, you may have an option enabled that disabled the cursor on full-screen.  Try the following steps to get this fixed up:

1) Click on the Mouse icon in the following directory: Control Panel\All Control Panel Items. 
2) A new window should open labeled as "Mouse Properties."
3) Click on the "Pointer Options" tab and make sure that the "Display Pointer Trails" option is unchecked.
4) Once that is complete, verify that "Hide Pointer While Typing" is also unchecked in the "Pointer Options" tab.

Hope that helps!
